text: Luis Héctor Álvarez Álvarez (October 25, 1919 - May 18, 2016) was a Mexican industrialist and politician. Álvarez was a member of the National Action Party. In 1958 he was a candidate for the Presidency of Mexico. He has also served as Mayor of Chihuahua. He served as President of the National Action Party from 1987 through 1993. ==Other websites== * Biography of Luis H. title: Luis H. Álvarez
